If you're in the mood for an action-packed thriller, I'd recommend "Taken" starring Liam Neeson. The story follows a retired spy on a mission to save his daughter from kidnappers.

For something completely different and hilarious, give "Zoolander" a try. This comedy film features an array of celebrities like Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, and Will Ferrell, and it's about a clueless fashion model who is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia! Enjoy!

The star-studded cast includes Will Ferrell, Luke Wilson, and Vince Vaughn, ensuring plenty of laughter along the way!

If you fancy something a bit more lighthearted with a touch of fantasy, "The Last Unicorn" (1982) is an animated musical featuring Angela Lansbury, Mia Farrow, and Christopher Lee that follows a unicorn on a quest to find her fellow kind. It's a timeless classic and has been enjoyed by audiences for years!

It's an intriguing tale about a superintendent who rescues a woman from his pool, only to discover she's a character from a bedtime story on a journey home. The film features a star-studded cast including Paul Giamatti and Bryce Dallas Howard. If you enjoy fantastical elements woven into real-world settings, this movie might be right up your alley!

If you prefer something grittier, "The Wrestler" directed by Darren Aronofsky could also be an interesting watch. It tells the story of a former wrestling champion trying to make a comeback in his twilight years, starring Mickey Rourke and Marisa Tomei.
